My Journey

A chronological overview of my professional and technical journey, from my early days with Linux to my current role as a Software Engineer.

2018

Started My Computing Journey

Began exploration with Programming with C++ in 16

2020

Started College

Enrolled in B.Tech. Computer Science at SRM Institute of Science and Technology

2021

Web Development

Started learning Web Development with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript then Moved to React and Node.js, built multiple projects

2022

DSA Journey

Started learning Data Structures and Algorithms, Solved 500+ problems on LeetCode, GeeksforGeeks, and HackerRank

2024

Graduated College

Completed B.Tech. in Computer Science with 9.49 CGPA

2024

First Professional Experience

Joined as a Junior Software Developer at Mindsprint, Working with Angular, React and Spring Boot, SQL Server, PostgreSQL, MySQL
